description:
How To Build a Simple Snow Diorama for D&D or Warhammer.

➢Support the Channel on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/bardscraft 
➢Tip Jar: https://www.paypal.me/lsjoman
➢Jakob's Instagram (mini painting & terrain): https://www.instagram.com/jcs_miniatures/
          -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ESSENTIAL STUFF!
➢Elmer's PVA Glue:
 -USA: https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00...
 -Canada: https://amzn.to/2TMEbrb
 
➢Army Painter Starter Set: 
 -USA: https://amzn.to/3a88BKn 
 -UK: https://amzn.to/2t7rTPu 
 -Canada: https://amzn.to/2NGfglm

➢Matt Black Spray Primer:
 -USA: https://amzn.to/36yzdkG
 -UK: https://amzn.to/2RV2yjX
 -Canada: https://amzn.to/311ZuGI

➢Citadel Paints: 
 -USA: https://www.amazon.com/s?k=citadel+pa...
 -UK: https://www.amazon.co.uk/s?k=citadel+...
 -Canada: https://www.amazon.ca/s?k=citadel+pai...

➢Start playing Dungeons & Dragons by getting the Core Rulebooks: 
 -USA: https://amzn.to/2MI4GK7 
 -UK: https://amzn.to/38ldwWt 
 -Canada: https://amzn.to/368Q9Ov

I'm set up as an Amazon Affiliate in some regions. Especially to make it easier for new crafters I have linked to products I use and recommend. Any purchases through affiliate links grant me a small commission which is a good way to support the channel at no extra cost. More recommended products on my website.
          ------------------------------------------------------------------------------

More about XPS-foam and the Snow Stuff
➢XPS- foam from Amazon: https://amzn.to/352fHwV

➢The XPS I use (Finnfoam): https://www.byggmax.fi/eristyslevy-finnfoam-p16442

➢Black Magic Craft's Video on Foam: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0_vV6X3iHs4

➢Snow: https://miniarmyhugetimesink.wordpress.com/2011/12/08/how-to-make-snow-bases/

          -------------------------------------------------------------------------------

DISCLAIMER: any symbols used are only for entertainment or story purposes.
